function.name: get_center
function.description: Computes the geometric center of a conformer generated from the input SMILES.

function.name: get_shape_moments
function.description: Calculates NPR1 and NPR2 shape descriptors from a generated conformer.

function.name: refine_conformers
function.description: Refines 3D conformers based on energy and RMSD thresholds.

energy_threshold.description: Energy threshold in kcal/mol to filter conformers

rms_threshold.description: RMS threshold in angstroms to filter similar conformers

function.name: get_conformer_energies
function.description: Returns the energies of multiple conformers generated from the input molecule.

function.name: calcnumaliphaticcarbocycles
function.description: returns the number of aliphatic (containing at least one non-aromatic bond) carbocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAliphaticCarbocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumaliphaticheterocycles
function.description: returns the number of aliphatic (containing at least one non-aromatic bond) heterocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAliphaticHeterocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumaliphaticrings
function.description: returns the number of aliphatic (containing at least one non-aromatic bond) rings for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAliphaticRings(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumamidebonds
function.description: returns the number of amide bonds in a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAmideBonds(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumaromaticcarbocycles
function.description: returns the number of aromatic carbocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAromaticCarbocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumaromaticheterocycles
function.description: returns the number of aromatic heterocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAromaticHeterocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumaromaticrings
function.description: returns the number of aromatic rings for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAromaticRings(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumatomstereocenters
function.description: Returns the total number of atomic stereocenters (specified and unspecified) C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAtomStereoCenters(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumatoms
function.description: returns the total number of atoms for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumAtoms(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumhba
function.description: returns the number of H-bond acceptors for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumHBA(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumhbd
function.description: returns the number of H-bond donors for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumHBD(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumheavyatoms
function.description: returns the number of heavy atoms for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumHeavyAtoms(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumheteroatoms
function.description: returns the number of heteroatoms for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumHeteroatoms(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumheterocycles
function.description: returns the number of heterocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumHeterocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumlipinskihba
function.description: returns the number of Lipinski H-bond acceptors for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumLipinskiHBA(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumlipinskihbd
function.description: returns the number of Lipinski H-bond donors for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumLipinskiHBD(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumrings
function.description: returns the number of rings for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumRings(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumrotatablebonds
function.description: returns the number of rotatable bonds for a molecule. strict = NumRotatableBondsOptions.NonStrict - Simple rotatable bond definition.

function.name: calcnumsaturatedcarbocycles
function.description: returns the number of saturated carbocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumSaturatedCarbocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumsaturatedheterocycles
function.description: returns the number of saturated heterocycles for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumSaturatedHeterocycles(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumsaturatedrings
function.description: returns the number of saturated rings for a molecule C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumSaturatedRings(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcnumunspecifiedatomstereocenters
function.description: Returns the number of unspecified atomic stereocenters C++ signature : unsigned int CalcNumUnspecifiedAtomStereoCenters(RDKit::ROMol)

function.name: calcoxidationnumbers
function.description: Adds the oxidation number/state to the atoms of a molecule as property OxidationNumber on each atom.  Use Pauling electronegativities.  This is experimental code, still under development. C++ signature : void CalcOxidationNumbers(RDKit::ROMol)
